front.div:
The correlation of the 0-0-transitions and the maxima of absorption and fluorescence with
the cr-Hammett constants lead to conclusions concerning the changes in the gap of the state
involved and their curvatures due to substitution. The formalism can be applied also using other
LFER parameters than a-Hammett constants.
